comment: Recipe looks good, I like the Columbus dry hop with the Rye. I will be definely try your Hops. I would offer suggestion of add in 0.25 - 0.5 pounds SpecialB instead of the Caramel to give that dark red color.

I'm not opposed to giving that a shot next time I brew this, but i already started my boil. I did this recipe a few years ago, and it turned out fantastic, and has been my favorite beer I've brewed to date.
